jobActions.name: Heavy Shot
jobActions.effect:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 160.
Additional Effect: 20% chance of becoming Straight Shot Ready
Duration: 30s

jobActions.name: Straight Shot
jobActions.effect:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 200.
Can only be executed when Straight Shot Ready.

jobActions.name: Raging Strikes
jobActions.effect:
Increases damage dealt by 15%.
Duration: 20s

jobActions.name: Venomous Bite
jobActions.effect:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 100.
Additional Effect: Venom
Potency: 15
Duration: 45s

jobActions.name: Bloodletter
jobActions.effect:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 110.
Maximum Charges: 3
Shares a recast timer with Rain of Death.

jobActions.name: Repelling Shot
jobActions.effect:
Jump 10 yalms away from current target.
Cannot be executed while bound.

jobActions.name: Quick Nock
jobActions.effect:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 110 to all enemies in a cone before you.
Additional Effect: 35% chance of becoming Shadowbite Ready
Duration: 30s

jobActions.name: Windbite
jobActions.effect:
Deals wind damage with a potency of 60.
Additional Effect: Wind damage over time
Potency: 20
Duration: 45s

jobActions.name: Mage's Ballad
jobActions.effect:
Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 100.
Additional Effect: Grants Mage's Ballad to self and all party members within 50 yalms, increasing damage dealt by 1%
Duration: 45s
Additional Effect: 80% chance to grant Repertoire
Repertoire Effect: Reduces the recast time of Bloodletter and Rain of Death by 7.5s
Additional Effect: Grants Mage's Coda

jobActions.name: The Warden's Paean
jobActions.effect:
Removes one select detrimental effect from self or target party member. If the target is not enfeebled, a barrier is created nullifying the target's next detrimental effect suffered.
Duration: 30s

jobActions.name: Barrage
jobActions.effect:
Triples the number of strikes for a single-target weaponskill. Additional effects added only once.
Duration: 10s
Additional Effect: Increases the potency of Shadowbite to 270
Additional Effect: Grants Straight Shot Ready
Duration: 30s

jobActions.name: Army's Paeon
jobActions.effect:
Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 100.
Additional Effect: Grants Army's Paeon to self and all party members within 50 yalms, increasing direct hit rate by 3%
Duration: 45s
Additional Effect: 80% chance to grant Repertoire
Repertoire Effect: Reduces weaponskill cast time and recast time, spell cast time and recast time, and auto-attack delay by 4%
Can be stacked up to 4 times.
Additional Effect: Grants Army's Coda

jobActions.name: Rain of Death
jobActions.effect:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 100 to target and all enemies nearby it.
Maximum Charges: 3
Shares a recast timer with Bloodletter.

jobActions.name: Battle Voice
jobActions.effect:
Increases direct hit rate of self and all nearby party members by 20%.
Duration: 15s

jobActions.name: The Wanderer's Minuet
jobActions.effect:
Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 100.
Additional Effect: Grants the Wanderer's Minuet to self and all party members within 50 yalms, increasing critical hit rate by 2%
Duration: 45s
Additional Effect: 80% chance to grant Repertoire
Repertoire Effect: Allows execution of Pitch Perfect
Can be stacked up to 3 times.
Additional Effect: Grants Wanderer's Coda

※Action changes to Pitch Perfect upon execution.

jobActions.name: Pitch Perfect
jobActions.effect:
Delivers an attack to the target. Potency varies with number of Repertoire stacks.
1 Repertoire Stack: 100
2 Repertoire Stacks: 220
3 Repertoire Stacks: 360
Can only be executed when the Wanderer's Minuet is active.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

jobActions.name: Empyreal Arrow
jobActions.effect: Delivers an attack with a potency of 230.

jobActions.name: Iron Jaws
jobActions.effect:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 100.
Additional Effect: If the target is suffering from a Caustic Bite or Stormbite effect inflicted by you, the effect timer is reset
Additional Effect: 35% chance of becoming Straight Shot Ready
Duration: 30s

jobActions.name: Sidewinder
jobActions.effect: Delivers an attack with a potency of 300.

jobActions.name: Troubadour
jobActions.effect:
Reduces damage taken by self and nearby party members by 10%.
Duration: 15s
Effect cannot be stacked with machinist's Tactician or dancer's Shield Samba.

jobActions.name: Caustic Bite
jobActions.effect:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 150.
Additional Effect: Poison
Potency: 20
Duration: 45s
Additional Effect: 35% chance of becoming Straight Shot Ready
Duration: 30s

jobActions.name: Stormbite
jobActions.effect:
Deals wind damage with a potency of 100.
Additional Effect: Wind damage over time
Potency: 25
Duration: 45s
Additional Effect: 35% chance of becoming Straight Shot Ready
Duration: 30s

jobActions.name: Nature's Minne
jobActions.effect:
Increases HP recovery via healing actions by 15% for self and nearby party members.
Duration: 15s

jobActions.name: Refulgent Arrow
jobActions.effect:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 280.
Can only be executed when Straight Shot Ready.

jobActions.name: Shadowbite
jobActions.effect:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 170 to target and all enemies nearby it.
Barrage Potency: 270
Can only be executed when Shadowbite Ready.

jobActions.name: Burst Shot
jobActions.effect:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 220.
Additional Effect: 35% chance of becoming Straight Shot Ready
Duration: 30s

jobActions.name: Apex Arrow
jobActions.effect:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 100 to all enemies in a straight line before you.
Soul Voice Gauge Cost: 20
Potency increases up to 500 as Soul Voice Gauge exceeds minimum cost.
Additional Effect: Grants Blast Arrow Ready upon execution while Soul Voice Gauge is 80 or higher
Duration: 10s
Consumes Soul Voice Gauge upon execution.

※Action changes to Blast Arrow while under the effect of Blast Arrow Ready.

jobActions.name: Ladonsbite
jobActions.effect:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 130 to all enemies in a cone before you.
Additional Effect: 35% chance of becoming Shadowbite Ready
Duration: 30s

jobActions.name: Blast Arrow
jobActions.effect:
Delivers an attack to all enemies in a straight line before you with a potency of 600 for the first enemy, and 60% less for all remaining enemies.
Can only be executed while under the effect of Blast Arrow Ready.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

jobActions.name: Radiant Finale
jobActions.effect:
Increases damage dealt by self and nearby party members.
Duration: 15s
Effectiveness is determined by the number of different Coda active in the Song Gauge.
1 Coda: 2%
2 Coda: 4%
3 Coda: 6%
Can only be executed when at least 1 coda is active.

roleActions.name: Second Wind
roleActions.effect:
Instantly restores own HP.
Cure Potency: 500

roleActions.name: Foot Graze
roleActions.effect:
Binds target.
Duration: 10s
Cancels auto-attack upon execution.
Target unbound if damage taken.

roleActions.name: Peloton
roleActions.effect:
Increases movement speed of self and nearby party members.
Duration: 30s
Effect ends when enmity is generated. Has no effect in battle.

roleActions.name: Head Graze
roleActions.effect: Interrupts the use of a target's action.

roleActions.name: Arm's Length
roleActions.effect:
Creates a barrier nullifying most knockback and draw-in effects.
Duration: 6s
Additional Effect: Slow +20% when barrier is struck
Duration: 15s

traits.name: Heavier Shot
traits.effect:
Adds to Heavy Shot a 20% chance that you will become Straight Shot Ready.
Duration: 30s

traits.name: Bite Mastery
traits.effect: Upgrades Venomous Bite and Windbite to Caustic Bite and Stormbite respectively.

traits.name: Enhanced Empyreal Arrow
traits.effect: Guarantees the trigger of the additional effects for current Mage's Ballad, Army's Paeon, and the Wanderer's Minuet when Empyreal Arrow hits a target.

traits.name: Straight Shot Mastery
traits.effect: Upgrades Straight Shot to Refulgent Arrow.

traits.name: Enhanced Quick Nock
traits.effect:
Adds to Quick Nock a 35% chance that you will become Shadowbite Ready.
Duration: 30s

traits.name: Bite Mastery II
traits.effect:
Adds to Stormbite, Caustic Bite, and Iron Jaws a 35% chance that you will become Straight Shot Ready.
Duration: 30s

traits.name: Heavy Shot Mastery
traits.effect: Upgrades Heavy Shot to Burst Shot.

traits.name: Enhanced Army's Paeon
traits.effect:
While under the effect of Army's Paeon with at least one stack of Repertoire, singing Mage's Ballad or the Wanderer's Minuet will grant Army's Muse, reducing weaponskill cast time and recast time, spell cast time and recast time, and auto-attack delay.
Duration: 10s
Allowing the effect of Army's Paeon and accumulated stacks of Repertoire to expire without singing Mage's Ballad or the Wanderer's Minuet will grant Army's Ethos.
Duration: 30s
While under the effect of Army's Ethos, singing Mage's Ballad or the Wanderer's Minuet will grant Army's Muse. Both Army's Ethos and Army's Muse require stacks of Repertoire, the number of which will determine the potency of the latter.
1 Repertoire: 1%
2 Repertoire: 2%
3 Repertoire: 4%
4 Repertoire: 12%

traits.name: Soul Voice
traits.effect: Increases Soul Voice Gauge by 5 each time Repertoire is granted.

traits.name: Enhanced Bloodletter
traits.effect: Allows a third charge of Bloodletter and Rain of Death.

traits.name: Enhanced Apex Arrow
traits.effect:
Grants Blast Arrow Ready upon executing Apex Arrow after the Soul Voice Gauge has reached 80 or higher.
Duration: 10s
Apex Arrow becomes Blast Arrow while under this effect.

traits.name: Enhanced Troubadour
traits.effect: Reduces Troubadour recast time to 90 seconds.

traits.name: Minstrel's Coda
traits.effect: Grants Mage's Coda, Army's Coda, or Wanderer's Coda upon singing Mage's Ballad, Army's Paeon, or the Wanderer's Minuet respectively.
